es.deusto.ingenieria.aike.xml

Class InformationXMLReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • es.deusto.ingenieria.aike.xml.InformationXMLReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler

    public abstract class InformationXMLReader
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
    It implements the funcionality of a parser for an XML document that contains the description of the problem environment.

                org.xml.sax.Attributes attributes)
                           throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Implementation of the startElement method from class DefaultHandler. This is executed every time the parser finds a new XML element.
        Specified by:
        startElement in interface org.xml.sax.ContentHandler
        Overrides:
        startElement in class org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
        Parameters:
        uri - String having the URL names space.
        localName - String having the element's name without the names space.
        qName - String having the element's name with the names space.
        attributes - Attributes having the list of element's attributes.
